title: If you take the SAT with the essay and you get a bad score on the essay, can you decide to not include the essay score on your application? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bad news: You cannot separate your essay score from the test score. When you send a score report to colleges, it will include the essay score if you took it. Good news: Colleges don’t care for essay scores, and they don’t matter for your application. Most colleges don’t require SAT/ACT essay anymore. Why do you want to write the essay if you are not sure you’ll be able to do well on it?
